text: Guia Jelo (born Guglielmina Francesca Maria Jelo di Lentini; 5 March 1956) is an Italian actress. She appeared in more than forty films since 1978. ==Selected filmography== * Corleone (1978) * The Bride Was Beautiful (1986) * Boys on the Outside (1990) * The Escort (1993) * The Whores (1994) * Strangled Lives (1996) * E adesso sesso (2001) as Anna * Raul: Straight to Kill (2005) as Caterina * My Name Is Thomas (2018) as Zia Rosario == References == == External links == * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Italian film actresses
title: Guia Jelo
